title: Venezuela Tests Higher Fuel Prices as Oil Sector Opens
description: Venezuela has started to increase fuel prices at gasoline stations in Caracas as it seeks fresh revenue while reopening its oil industry to foreign investment and boosting output.
content: Venezuela has started to increase fuel prices at gasoline stations in Caracas as it seeks fresh revenue while reopening its oil industry to foreign investment and boosting output.
